description: From Middle English copful, copfull, cupfulle, cuppefulle, equivalent to cup +‎ -ful. Cognate with Saterland Frisian Kopful (“cupful”), West Frisian kopfol (“cupful”).

entries.meaning: The amount necessary to fill a cup.
examples: Add a cupful of milk to the sauce.

entries.meaning: A half pint, i.e. eight ounces
